errors.cannotContinue: Sorry, I am not able to continue here.
errors.contextTooLong: Sorry, it seems this message exceeds this model context length. Try to shorten your prompt or try another model.
errors.couldNotGenerate: Sorry, I could not generate text for that prompt.
errors.invalidModel: Sorry, it seems this model is not available.
errors.missingApiKey: You need to enter your API key in the Models tab of Settings in order to chat.
errors.outOfCredits: Sorry, it seems you have run out of credits. Check the balance of your LLM provider account.
errors.pluginDescriptionTooLong: Sorry, it seems that one of the plugins description is too long. If you tweaked them in Settings | Advanced, please try again.
errors.quotaExceeded: Sorry, it seems you have reached the rate limit of your LLM provider account. Try again later.
errors.tryWithoutParams: Sorry, I could not generate text for that prompt. Do you want to try again without model parameters?
errors.tryWithoutPlugins: Sorry, I could not generate text for that prompt. Do you want to try again without plugins?

scratchpad.fileError: This file is not a scratchpad file. Please try again with another file.
scratchpad.placeholder:
Start typing your document or
ask Witsy to write something for you!

Once you started you can ask Witsy
to make modification on your document.

If you highligh a portion of your text,
Witsy will only update this portion.

Also check out the Writing Assistant
in the action bar in the lower right corner!

Give it a go!

tts.sampleText: Welcome to Witsy, the ultimate AI desktop assistant.
tts.serviceDisclaimer: The service may stop working at any point in time.

computerUse.title: Computer Use will interact with your computer and perform mouse and keyboard actions. These actions may cause unexpected behavior which could result in data loss.

conversation.title: Check the conversation options by right-clicking on the microphone icon in the chat window.

favoriteModels.title: Click on the LLM icon: your preferred models will be grouped under the star icon!

folderList.title:
The folder list is a great way to organize your chat sessions. Click on the folder icon at the bottom of the sidebar to create new folders.

The menu on the right of every folder allows you to manage your folders.

The context menu of your chats allows you to move them to a folder.

realtime.title: Realtime chat can quickly be expensive. The estimated cost provided is just an estimate and may not be correct. Click on the blob to start and stop chatting!

transcribe.clickToRecord: Click the record button when you are ready!
